## isValidRuleSetArg() function

Validates whether a rule set is an array of valid ruleset strings

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
declare function isValidRuleSetArg(input: unknown): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  input | unknown | The Array of rule set arguments |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean

True is the input is an array of valid rules
